title: Female Phoenix of the Dark Apocalypse - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mature   Mystery   Supernatural
tags: Apocalypse   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Demons   Evolution   Fanfiction   Female Protagonist   Firearms   Game Elements   Level System   Monsters   Survival Game   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Vampires   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: 曾经的青柳
description:
Life would always find a way out!

In the history of the earth, from the extinction of the dinosaurs, to the battle of the gods and to the fall of the Olympian gods. Behind every mysterious legend, stood a horrifying shadow – extinction. 

Tossed in the midst of the wind and rain, Xiao Yuxin leads her companions to pave the way and usher in a new life on earth.>
